name: Darius Miles
description: Darius Miles is a member of 6th Street and a drug dealer. He runs a drug trafficking ring of beta acid inArroyo, who gathers ingredients for the drug to deliver to a lab in theDewdrop Innmotel. Miles was put on theNCPD's most wanted for his drug ring, as well as murder.Vcan encounter him on Hargreaves street, tasked by the NCPD to neutralize him.
